title: Baylor Football Sex Assault Scandal Details Emerge
itunes:title: Baylor Football Sex Assault Scandal Details Emerge
description:
A federal lawsuit against Baylor University includes shocking details of how the school allegedly used sex to lure high school recruits for its football team. Investigators accuse athletic department staffers of covering up sex assaults, which female students allege included more than 30 players over four years. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke look at scandal in this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
